1: A Psalm and song of the sons of Corah. Her foundations are upon the holy hills:
2: the LORD loveth the gates of Sion more, than all the dwellings of Jacob.
3: Very excellent things are spoken of thee, thou city of God. Selah.
4: I will think upon Rahab and Babylon, so that they shall know me. Yea the Philistines also, and they of Tyre, with the Morians. Lo there was he born.
5: And of Sion it shall be reported, that he was born in her, even the most highest(hyest) which hath builded her.
6: The LORD shall cause it to be preached and written among the people, that he was born there. Selah.
7: Therefore the dwelling of all singers and dancers is in thee.
